body.name: contact[company_name]
body.description: A contact requires a non-blank company_name, firstname or lastname.

body.name: contact[country]
body.description: ISO two-character country code, e.g. NL or DE.

body.name: contact[delivery_method]
body.description: Can be Email, Simplerinvoicing, Post or Manual.

body.name: contact[customer_id]
body.description: Will be assigned automatically if empty. Should be unique for the administration.

body.name: contact[firstname]
body.description: A contact requires a non-blank company_name, firstname or lastname.

body.name: contact[lastname]
body.description: A contact requires a non-blank company_name, firstname or lastname.

body.name: contact[send_invoices_to_email]
body.description: Should be one or more valid email addresses, separated by a comma.

body.name: contact[send_estimates_to_email]
body.description: Should be one or more valid email addresses, separated by a comma.

body.name: contact[sepa_active]
body.description: When true, all other SEPA fields are required.

body.name: contact[sepa_iban]
body.description: Should be a valid IBAN.

body.name: contact[sepa_bic]
body.description: Should be a valid BIC.

body.name: contact[sepa_mandate_date]
body.description: Should be a date in the past.

body.name: contact[sepa_sequence_type]
body.description: Can be RCUR, FRST, OOFF or FNAL.

body.description: Required

body.name: payment[price]
body.description:
Required
            
            Both a decimal and a string ‘10,95’ are accepted. Should be a number -1,000,000,000 <= n <= 1,000,000,000.

body.name: payment[price_base]
body.description: Amount paid expressed in the base currency. Required for foreign currencies. Should be a number -1,000,000,000 <= n <= 1,000,000,000.

body.name: payment[financial_account_id]
body.description: Should be a valid financial account id.

body.name: payment[financial_mutation_id]
body.description: Should be a valid financial mutation id.

body.name: payment[manual_payment_action]
body.description: Can be private_payment, payment_without_proof, cash_payment, rounding_error, bank_transfer, balance_settlement or invoices_settlement.

body.description: Should be a valid ledger account id.

body.description: Default document style is used when value is not provided. Should be a valid document style id.

body.name: estimate[workflow_id]
body.description: If value is not provided, the workflow saved in the contact is used. If the contact doesn’t have a default workflow, the administration’s default workflow is used. Should be a valid workflow id.

body.description: Can be da, de, en, es, fr, it, no, nl, pt or tr.

body.name: estimate[discount]
body.description: Discount percentage, e.g. 10,0%. Should be a number 0 <= n <= 100.

body.name: estimate[details_attributes][period]
body.description: String with a date range: 20140101..20141231, presets are also allowed: this_month, prev_month, next_month, etc.

body.name: estimate[details_attributes][price]
body.description: Both a decimal and a string ‘10,95’ are accepted.
